flavourText: Lurks in every equation, shifting forms with every operation. Solve for x before it solves for you.
A towering polynomial monstrosity. Factor it down piece by piece or be crushed by its complexity.
Coils through all four quadrants. Only those who master every identity can break its cycle.
Grows exponentially stronger each turn. Use logarithms to cut it down to size.
Haunts every curve, hiding at stationary points. Find its rate of change before it vanishes.
Vast and formless, it fills the space beneath every curve. Sum its parts to reveal its weakness.
Claims to know every outcome. Test its hypotheses and prove it wrong.
